short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluate JSON-LD resources for Science on Schema.org guidelines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables easy viewing of JSON-LD metadata embedded within web pages. 

For pages that provide metadata about schema.org/Dataset structures, an option for validating the metadata against the guidelines of the Earth Science Information Partners (ESIP) Science-on-Schema.org guidelines available at https://science-on-schema.org.
